name: time_series_endpoint
description: Retrieve historical rates between two specified dates. `Maximum of 365 day time range`

base.description: Three-letter currency code of the currency would would like to convert from. This currency will be converted into the code of the currency provided in the to parameter
base.title: Base

symbols.description: A comma-separated list of currency codes to convert the from parameter into.
symbols.title: Symbols

name: convert
description: In addition to providing converstion rates, our API provides a dedicated endpoint to easily do conversion on a specific amount of the currency.

_from.description: The three-letter currency code of the currency you would like to convert from.
_from.title: From

to.description: The three-letter currency code of the currency you would like to convert to.
to.title: To

date.description: Optionally, provide a specific date (format YYYY-MM-DD) to use historical rates for this conversion.
date.title: Date

name: symbols
description: Retrieve a list of all currently available currency symbols

name: historical_exchange_rates
description: Retrieve historical exchange rate data. Data is available for most currencies all the way back to the year of 1999.

base.description: Three-letter currency code of the currency would would like to convert from. This currency will be converted into the code of the currency provided in the to parameter
base.title: Base

symbols.description: A comma-separated list of currency codes to convert the from parameter into.
symbols.title: Symbols

name: recent_exchange_rates
description: Retrieve the latest exchange rate data. Refresh rate will depend on your subscription: updated every 60 minutes, every 10 minutes or every 60 seconds.

base.description: Three-letter currency code of the currency would would like to convert from. This currency will be converted into the code of the currency provided in the to parameter
base.title: Base

symbols.description: A comma-separated list of currency codes to convert the from parameter into.
symbols.title: Symbols
